severity.description: Very high confidence with severe indicators, auto-block recommended
severity.reasoning: Severity CRITICAL assigned due to: very high model confidence (98.1%), Volumetric Flood attack type (+10% severity), extreme feature contributions (+2%). Total severity score: 100.0%

immediate_actions.name: Rate Limiting (iptables)
immediate_actions.description: Limit incoming packets to 100/second with burst of 200

immediate_actions.name: Connection Limiting
immediate_actions.description: Limit maximum concurrent connections from source IP

alternative_actions.name: Bandwidth Throttling (tc)
alternative_actions.description: Limit bandwidth from source IP to 1 Mbit
commands: tc qdisc add dev eth0 root handle 1: htb default 12
tc class add dev eth0 parent 1: classid 1:1 htb rate 1mbit ceil 2mbit
tc filter add dev eth0 protocol ip parent 1:0 prio 1 u32 match ip src 192.168.1.10 flowid 1:1
